How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
hola, si!
brilliant! It seems like I'm back at square one.
I see a twig to my left that leads to a small island with a tiger on it. how do I proceed?
de alli, you can take a left y continuar derecho y veras another stick you can move on to
got it, so i took a left and moved straight
now, i'm seeing a snake that is southeast of a giraffe. am i on the right track?
si, perfect you're closer to the treasure
cool! next, do i need to go towards the snake or the giraffe?
ve towards la vivura
close to there is the treasure
to your derecha
¡lo tengo! Justo al lado de la serpiente, encontré el tesoro.
¡Salud! *finalizado*
alright, took a step to the right
now, do i keep going this way or should i change direction?
alright, headed towards the snake
now what?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
hola, si im ready
estoy parada junto a un perro next to a bench
awesome! from the white dog, walk a few steps west, go below the wooden bench and cross the trail
now, surprise! pull a u-turn, cross the trail again and walk back towards the white dog. are you there?
that's it! now head south, go over the branch
there should be another white dog chilling by a cool picnic setup. see it?
si, i am with the other white dog now. where do i go now?
great! now, carry on west
you'll step over a picnic mat and a bowl of berries. keep going till you reach the river
okay aqui estoy. do i cross the log to get to the next trail?
yeah, spot on! cross that wooden branch
it's like a free bridge. how cool is that?
really cool! okay i'm across now. i see people on a bike on a bridge. do i follow them?
no, todavía no
en su lugar, rodee un arbusto verde desde la derecha hasta llegar al puesto de floristería. No pueden faltar flores bonitas, ¿verdad?
si, they smell muy bonitas
aqui estoy, now where do i go?
me alegro de que te guste
now, turn west, passing right below the stand. you'll reach a large bridge
go west and pass the bridge, then stop at the two folks reading newspapers
okoay, ya pase. i see the nice old couple and they seem so sweet. ahora donde voy?
aww, that's cute! from the couple, take a few steps south
you'll see another branch and a green bush
okay, veo un venado
oh, that's great! go east between the branch and the bush
and, there you are! you've navigated the path brilliantly!
am i in the right place?
wow, gracias!
¡Sí! ¡Lo lograste amigo! estás parado justo al lado del ciervo joven
¡buen trabajo!
¡de nada! you did an amazing job
i hope you had as much fun as i did. keep exploring, buddy!

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
hi, si! y tu?
sure am! i'm at the tent
what's next?
okay, from there vas a tomar unos pasos south hasta que pases un perrito y veas un dirt path. get on that
gotcha
okay, i see the dog and the dirt path. where to next?
from there, walk straight. you're going to see a campfire and you can pass that y continua hasta que llegues a un carro azul
cool beans! i see the campfire and the blue car now
what now?
de alli, you're going to keep taking the dirt path southbound hasta que te encuentres con un big telescope. it's cool
got it! i see the telescope
now what mate?
from there, puedes continuar a la izquerda and up the rock path to the cabin and you're there!
i see the house surrounded by rocks, i'm going in
*finished*

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
si estoy lista!
estoy back en unas palmas
brilliant! Let's go there. First, you have to move towards the southwest, passing under the first palm tree
do you see the second palm tree? Cross through there and then turn sharply to the left before the third palm tree. continue south
excellent! now, take a few steps and then turn slightly left
next, swerve back right, heading south. can you see a brown puppy? you need to keep it on your right side
okay, i have the cute puppy on my right side now
¡gran trabajo! Sigue adelante hasta que veas una gran roca a tu izquierda y una pequeña roca a tu derecha, cruza entre ellas.
Más adelante hay un cuerpo de agua. ¡A por ello!
si, veo el cuerpo de agua y un cangrejo
perfect! take a turn right at the big red crab, you're gonna walk a bit in the water but don't worry
follow along the big rock, going west
sigo til i reach the shark?
¡sí! En nuestro amigo con aletas, querrás hacer un giro brusco a la derecha.
veo una pelota de volleyball. estoy bien?
claro que sí, estás en el camino correcto
ahora, cruza entre la roca mediana y la pelota de voleibol y continúa hacia el norte
okay, i did that! ahora estoy de frente de un speaker y on my left is a tent
perfecto! entre la carpa roja y el grande altavoz, desvíate ligeramente a la izquierda y sigue hacia el noroeste
okay, de alli veo un canoe. esta bbien?
¡brillante! ahora, da la vuelta a la tienda en forma de arco y dirígete hacia el sur
pero no llegues al agua
okay, im at the edge of the agua.
crucial time! turn right and walk past the red kayak
stay on land though!
okay, ahora quw
que
turn sharply to the right and keep going until you spot a green bush
you're almost there!
keep going north, moving along the kayak until you reach a small green bush! you made it!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I enjoy it because it shows more about that person and their connection to that language.
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:

general_survey.answer: I love being able to speak more than one language
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your language background?
